channel.title: Blog on BenCurranDev - Build Awesome Stuff In The Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on BenCurranDev - Build Awesome Stuff In The Cloud

item.title: First Post
item.description: I have actually put something here finally! I’m still building it for now, learning Hugo, but this is up using GitHub Codespaces for development and authoring, GitHub Actions for automated build and deploy and GitHub Pages for hosting! Like a real dev!
item.content: I have actually put something here finally! I’m still building it for now, learning Hugo, but this is up using GitHub Codespaces for development and authoring, GitHub Actions for automated build and deploy and GitHub Pages for hosting! Like a real dev!
